SENT.plain: A 2-year-old girl with Marfan's syndrome also had recurrent episodes of upper respiratory infection, otitis media, tonsillitis, and asthma
Immunologic evaluation showed lack of delayed hypersensitivity skin test response despite previous exposure
The coincidence of Marfan's syndrome and either XXX or immunologic dysfunction has not been reported previously
This case clearly illustrates that more than one abnormality may occur in a single patient
